subject: Insertion of clause regarding Digital Signatory in Notice Inviting Tender Document.
text: 9Trdf <cfly <THT gfedrut Th4 Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (036 waa7 3r TTHR Taa4) '4H /Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 75 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) Ti-5 Wd 6, #qer-10, ERGT; Tf fornt 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 NHAI11O13/DGM (LA/Coord)/2012 Date: 24.04.2012 POLICY MATTERS: TECHNICAL (98/2012) (Decision taken on IT Division File No: NHAIIPhase-IVBINH-2ABI2O1OIPPPAC) Sub:-Insertion of Clause regarding Digital Signatory in Notice Inviting Tender Document; Consequent upon  confirmation by LT. Division that it is   possible to confirm the digital signatory and the authorized signatory holding the power of Attorney before opening of a Technical Bid, Competent Authority in NHAI decided that the following clause, given below in Italics, shall be inserted in Notices Inviting Tender: The authorized signatory holding Power of Attorney shall only be the Digital Signatory. In case authorized signatory holding Power of Attorney and Digital Signatory are not the same, the bid shall be considered non-responsive. The above shall be applicable with effect from the date of issue of the notification Technical Division may incorporate the modification in this regard in the e-tendering of NHAI.
